dnf_game.dnf_main.data_handler.bestiary module¶

...

class dnf_game.dnf_main.data_handler.bestiary.Bestiary(optmize=False)[source]¶

...

bestiary = Bestiary() bestiary.get(“aasimar”)

classmethod get_filtered(filter_list=None)[source]¶

...

filter_list: a list of 4 element tuples containing:
[0] the key to be searched; [1] the value to be searched; [2] the re function (match or search); [3] the condition: if True, the result will be valid if the function returns True.
